com.moomoohk.Grame.Core

Class GrameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.moomoohk.Grame.Core.GrameManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GrameManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Grame Manager takes care of all the internal Grame operations.

    Indexes and ticks any GrameObjects and Grids that are created automatically.

    Since:
    2013-04-05
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Meshulam Silk (moomoohk@ymail.com)

      • run

        public void run()
        Starts the Grame Manager clock.

        This method should never be called by the user as doing that might create issues.

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • add

        public static int add(GrameObject go)
        Adds a GrameObject to the Grame Object list.

        The user should never have to call this method.

        Parameters:
        go - GrameObject to add.
        Returns:
        The ID number for the object.

      • add

        public static int add(Grid g)
        Adds a Grid to the Grid list.

        The user should never have to call this method.

        Parameters:
        g - Grid to add.
        Returns:
        The ID number for the Grid.

      • findGrameObject

        public static GrameObject findGrameObject(int id)
        Finds and returns a GrameObject from the Grame Objects list.
        If the object is not found, null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the object to find.
        Returns:
        The GrameObject with that ID. If not in the list, null will be returned.

      • findGrid

        public static Grid findGrid(int id)
        Finds and returns a Grid from the Grid list.
        If the Grid is not found, null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Grid to find.
        Returns:
        The Grid with that ID. If not in the list, null will be returned.

        public static void pauseAllGrameObjects(boolean f)

      • getAIs

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,MovementAI> getAIs()
        Gets all the loaded MovementAIs sorted in a HashMap<String, MovementAI> where the names (spaces replaced with '-') are the keys.
        Returns:
        A HashMap<String, MovementAI> of all loaded MovementAIs.

        Returns:
        A HashMap<String, Render> of all loaded Renders.
